title: Initial data loading and display
description: Verify that Nikke data is fully loaded from the local server API and displayed correctly on application start.

steps.description: Open the Nikke Build Search web application
Check that all Nikke characters are loaded with no missing entries
Verify that the full list of Nikke data is displayed on the main page
Confirm no errors are shown during the loading process

title: Smart tag search with AND condition
description: Check the smart tag search functionality correctly filters Nikke data using AND conditions.

steps.description: Enter multiple tags combined with AND operator in the smart tag search input
Trigger the search or wait for auto-update
Confirm only Nikke characters matching all specified tags are displayed
Verify that no Nikke with partial tag match appear in the results

title: Smart tag search with OR condition
description: Validate smart tag search returns results with any of the specified tags when using OR condition.

steps.description: Input multiple tags combined with OR operator in the search
Execute the search
Ensure that the displayed Nikke include any that match at least one tag
Verify that Nikke without any tags from search are excluded

title: Smart tag search with NOT condition
description: Ensure smart tag search excludes Nikke containing tags specified with NOT operator.

steps.description: Set search input using NOT operator with specific tags to exclude
Run the search command
Validate that no Nikke containing the excluded tags appear in the results

title: Open Nikke detail page and verify data display
description: Check that selecting a Nikke from the list opens the detail page with accurate information displayed.

steps.description: Click on a specific Nikke entry from the main list
Verify that the detail page loads with complete, precise data for the selected Nikke
Check all key fields (e.g., performance stats, tags) are present and correct

title: Enable edit mode and modify Nikke details
description: Verify that a user can enter edit mode, modify fields, and save changes that persist in data storage.

steps.description: Navigate to the detail page of a Nikke
Activate the edit mode
Change values in one or more editable fields
Save the changes
Confirm the detail page reflects the updated values
Reload application and verify changes persist in local storage and server data

title: Invalid input handling in Nikke editor
description: Check the system response and error handling when entering invalid data in the Nikke edit fields.

steps.description: Open the edit mode for a Nikke detail
Enter invalid characters or out-of-range numbers in numeric fields
Attempt to save the changes
Verify the application prevents saving and shows appropriate validation error messages
Check that original data remains unchanged if save is aborted

title: Create, edit, and delete a 5-person squad
description: Test the Squad Manager functionality for adding a new squad, modifying its composition, and deleting it.

steps.description: In Squad Manager, create a new squad with 5 Nikke characters
Confirm the squad is saved and appears in the squad list
Edit the squad by adding/removing Nikke members
Validate the squad reflects the updated members
Delete the created squad
Verify the squad is removed from the list and data storage

title: Verify synergy analysis results in Squad Manager
description: Ensure that synergy analysis for a constructed 5-person squad provides correct and consistent outputs.

steps.description: Create or select a 5-person squad
Check that synergy analysis is performed and displayed for the squad
Validate that synergy results match expected logic based on squad composition

title: RL stage burst supply graphic simulation displays correctly
description: Verify that the RL stage burst calculation graphic shows expected values visually and updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the burst calculator graphic interface
Input or select parameters for different RL stages
Confirm the graphical output updates to reflect burst supply amounts accurately
Check the visualization is clear, intuitive, and corresponds with calculated data

title: Data synchronization between local cache and server after data update
description: Ensure that when Nikke details are edited and saved, changes propagate properly to local server API and localstorage cache.

steps.description: Edit and save Nikke details
Verify API call is made to update local server
Check localstorage cache is updated with edited Nikke data
Reload the app and confirm updated data persists

title: Search filters correctly apply AND, OR, and NOT operators in combination
description: Test complex search queries combining multiple AND, OR, NOT conditions to ensure search results match expected filtered set.

steps.description: Enter a combined query with AND, OR, NOT operators within the smart tag search
Execute the search
Confirm the results strictly follow the logical combination of conditions
Check edge case behavior such as empty sets or overlapping conditions

title: Verify application code structure and performance with functional components and hooks
description: Verify that codebase follows React best practices by using functional components and React hooks consistently, and that performance remains efficient.

steps.description: Review the main React components and utils for use of functional components and hooks
Ensure no class components are present unless justified
Check that hooks usage follows React guidelines without redundant re-renders
Perform performance profiling during interactions such as loading data, searching, editing, and squad managing
Confirm UI responsiveness and absence of memory leaks or lag

title: Handle API failure and local server errors gracefully
description: Validate that application handles failures of local server API or network errors by displaying appropriate error messages and maintaining stable state.

steps.description: Simulate local server API failure or network disconnection when loading Nikke data
Verify that user is notified with a clear error message or fallback UI
Attempt to save edited Nikke details during server failure
Confirm save failure is handled gracefully without app crash and user is informed

title: Verify UI usability and accessibility across main features
description: Check that UI components such as search bars, filters, detail views, editors, and graphics conform to usability and accessibility standards.

steps.description: Interact with search bars and smart tag inputs, verifying keyboard navigation and screen reader support
Open Nikke details and edit mode, ensure form elements are properly labeled and accessible
Use squad manager and check for intuitive UI and clear feedback
Review burst supply graphic for color contrast, labels, and readability
Confirm UI components are usable with keyboard only and comply with WCAG guidelines
